casebody.data:
Lisa TAYLOR
v.
CHIPOTLE MEXICAN GRILL, INC., Lauricella Land Company, LLC, Elmwood Village Center, LLC, Lauricella & Associates, Inc., Elmwood Retail Properties, LLC and Travelers Insurance Company NO. 2019-C-0154 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 8, 2019 Denied. JOHNSON, C.J., would grant.

GUIDRY, J., recused.

GENOVESE, J., would grant.
